package.description: Python encapsulation of Wiimote+ functions. Publishes: - Accelerator reading (~100hz) - Gyro reading (~100hz) Listens to status requests: - LED1_Status ... LED4_Status - Rumble_Status - Battery_Status Commands: - set_LED1(0/1) - set_LED2(0/1) - set_LED3(0/1) - set_LED4(0/1) - set_Rumble(0/1)
package.author: Andreas Paepcke
